body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:
After a freshly installed cluster, the following error appears every 5s in the `kubelet` logs:
```
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: E1011 17:47:03.196677   19325 runtime.go:66] Observed a panic: reflect.unexportedTypePanic{(*reflect.rtype)(0x36e9300), (*reflect.rtype)(0x33d41e0), (*reflect.rtype)(0x38043e0), (*reflect.rtype)(0x3499fc0), (*reflect.rtype)(0x3800ee0), (*reflect.rtype)(0x37a0fe0), (*reflect.rtype)(0x3047580)} (an unexported field was encountered, nested like this: *checkpoint.remoteConfigMap -> checkpoint.remoteConfigMap -> *v1.NodeConfigSource -> v1.NodeConfigSource -> *v1.ConfigMapNodeConfigSource -> v1.ConfigMapNodeConfigSource -> string)
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:72
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:65
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:51
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:573
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:502
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/third_party/forked/golang/reflect/deep_equal.go:96
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:573

Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/third_party/forked/golang/reflect/deep_equal.go:186

Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:133
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:134
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:88
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /workspace/anago-v1.11.3-beta.0.71+a4529464e4629c/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:79
Oct 11 17:47:03 serverlab61 kubelet[19325]: /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2361
```

**What you expected to happen**:
No error logs as it is a freshly installed cluster

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
New fresh cluster with only `kube-system` namespace

**Anything else we need to know?**:
```
# kubectl get nodes -owide
NAME          STATUS   ROLES    AGE   VERSION   INTERNAL-IP    EXTERNAL-IP   OS-IMAGE                  KERNEL-VERSION                  CONTAINER-RUNTIME
serverlab61   Ready    master   1h    v1.11.3   10.138.132.7   <none>        Oracle Linux Server 7.5   4.1.12-112.16.4.el7uek.x86_64   docker://18.6.1
serverlab62   Ready    master   1h    v1.11.3   10.138.132.8   <none>        Oracle Linux Server 7.5   4.1.12-112.16.4.el7uek.x86_64   docker://18.6.1
serverlab63   Ready    master   1h    v1.11.3   10.138.132.9   <none>        Oracle Linux Server 7.5   4.1.12-112.16.4.el7uek.x86_64   docker://18.6.1
```

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
# kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.1", GitCommit:"4ed3216f3ec431b140b1d899130a69fc671678f4", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-10-05T16:46:06Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.2", GitCommit:"bb9ffb1654d4a729bb4cec18ff088eacc153c239", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-08-07T23:08:19Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: On-premises (HP G7)
```
# uname -a
Linux serverlab61 4.1.12-112.16.4.el7uek.x86_64 #2 SMP Mon Mar 12 23:57:12 PDT 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
```
# cat /etc/os-release
NAME="Oracle Linux Server"
VERSION="7.5"
ID="ol"
VERSION_ID="7.5"
PRETTY_NAME="Oracle Linux Server 7.5"
ANSI_COLOR="0;31"
CPE_NAME="cpe:/o:oracle:linux:7:5:server"
HOME_URL="https://linux.oracle.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugzilla.oracle.com/"

ORACLE_BUGZILLA_PRODUCT="Oracle Linux 7"
ORACLE_BUGZILLA_PRODUCT_VERSION=7.5
ORACLE_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="Oracle Linux"
ORACLE_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION=7.5
```
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
```
# uname -a
Linux serverlab61 4.1.12-112.16.4.el7uek.x86_64 #2 SMP Mon Mar 12 23:57:12 PDT 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
- Install tools: `kubeadm`

title: "Observed a panic" error logs in kubelet every 5s
